author: Daniel Greene
description:
I’ve never been the biggest Star Wars fan—but Andor changed it for my dumb face. This is Star Wars at its absolute best, and in this review of Andor Seasons 1 and 2, I’ll explain how it managed to win me over and make me eat my words about the franchise, at least this one time. 

From the writing to the performances, worldbuilding, and mature storytelling, Andor is something different. It’s proof that Star Wars doesn’t need Jedi to be brilliant—it just needs to be this planned out! SHOCKING!

title: Andor Is the Best Star Wars in Decades – Even I Loved It | Full Show Review
